column5: Heights living at it's finest! A unique blend of traditional Heights architecture with up to date conveniences and design. Directly across the street from Woodland Park, this is truly a special opportunity. Large front porch, detached garage with flex room above. Premium Thermador appliances, wine cooler, beverage cooler, open concept, back yard, large island kitchen great for entertaining , 5 minutes from downtown. Furnished Home.
column8: Spacious Elegant home, Great for Superbowl
